body.name: Hearing Aids-Hearing Aids For Senior,Hearing Aid Amplifier,Over the Counter Hearing Aids for Adults,Hearing Assistance Sound Amplifier for Ears Personal Hearing Amplifer for Senior with Battery, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 8 hrs
Or fastest pickup Saturday, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 45 mins
features: Hearing Aids With Low Noise - HOLFENRY hearing aids for senior have 16 channels of sound processing. This can help you cut out noise and regain lost sound. Wear hearing aids and you can resume enjoying watching TV, talking to others, listening to music, and more.

Comfort And At Ease - Hearing aids are designed with reference to bluetooth earphones, so they will be comfortable to wear for a long time. There are three sizes of earplugs, S/M/L, to choose from. So the HOLFENRY hearing aids suitable for most people. If you choose the right earplugs and wear them close enough, it won't produce squealing.

87hrs Usage On One Charge - Hearing amplifier can be used for 17 hours. And you'll get an extra 70 hours from charging case. A total of 87 hours of use. Every time you put your hearing aids in the charging case, they charge automatically. The long-lasting power allows you to use it all day with confidence.

Easy To Use - ①Choose the earplugs for hearing aids that fit you well, and let the hearing aids for senior fit tightly into your ear holes. ②Press and hold the touch button of the hearing amplifier to turn it on. ③Click to change the volume, double-click to change the mode. Each time you turn it on, the previous settings will be used by default. If you don't know how to use it, please feel free to contact us. Professional after-sales support will reply within 24 hours.

Small And Inconspicuousness - Referring to the design of bluetooth earphones, this hearing aids is no different from ordinary bluetooth earphones in appearance. You can use it anywhere with peace of mind. Don't worry about other people's strange eyes again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hearing aids are suitable for people with mild to moderate hearing loss. There are four modes: Mode 1, full-band amplification; Mode 2, mid-high frequency amplification; Mode 3, mid-frequency amplification; Mode 4, mid-low frequency amplification. Users need to choose mode according their condition.

Not only that, HOLFENRY hearing aids for seniors rechargeable with noise cancelling have a total of 16 channels processed simultaneously. Most ordinary ear hearing aid have only 8 channels of processing capability. Therefore, this hearing aids hears less noise and receives a more realistic sound.

After fully charged, digital hearing aids can be used for 17 hours. In addition, the charging case provides an additional 70 hours of power. Just put the hearing aid in the charging case and it will be charged automatically. So, HOLFENRY hearing aids can be used continuously for a total of 87 hours.
Referring to the design of the earbuds, the hearing aids for senior looks like an ordinary earbuds. Although small, it can output a maximum of 103 dB and can amplify it by 35 dB.

Sharp sounds in hearing aids Squealing is caused by the hearing aid not fitting perfectly to the ear canal. Please check whether the right and left ears are correctly fitted, or replace the hearing aid with a larger ear cap, or put the hearing aid on tighter. Hearing aid does not work after full charge This is usually the result of not removing the transparent film from the hearing aid. The transparent film is used to isolate the current. After removing it, place the hearing aid back into the charging case and recharge it. Then it will be normal. Loud noise in the aids When an inappropriate mode is selected, the hearing aid amplifies a frequency band that is not what you need. It will produce a large noise. Double-click to switch modes. Why is there noise when using it? Tips: When you first wear the hearing aids, it is normal if you hear some background noise, because you hear more sounds than before, and the noise will reduce after 2-3 weeks when you get used to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend getting these hearing aids. They work very well, strengthening my hearing wonderfully. They are quite comfortable, sitting perfectly in my ear. The box comes with three different sized earbuds depending on your needs. The battery life is quite strong as well. They also come at a great price.

reviews.reviewText: Long lasting power allows to use it all day with confidence, great value, product well received, has 16 channels of sound processing can help reduce noise and regain lost sound, designed with reference to bluetooth earphones comfortable to wear for a long time, every time put the hearing aid into the charging case, it will charge automatically, very easy to use , it worked fine, and it solved my problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars On/off mode and volume control button doesn't respond consistently.
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted these to work for my husband. The volume level he needs the TV to be at is way too loud for me. I was setting them up for him and didn't like the control button. It did not respond to touch consistently and was frustrating. Never could get both ears set up to match. I will be returning them.

reviews.reviewText: My dad keep loosing his Hearing Aid, and now I want to try another different than the one from the doctors office , this Hearing Aid is very good quality, my dad love it!
